channel.title: Comments on: On Another Note
channel.description: Blogging demolitions one building at a time.

item.title: By: C.C. de V.
item.dc:creator: C.C. de V.
item.description: You've convinced me that I need to make a tiny Art Deco bathroom in miniature...I remember the balcony lobby at the Mayan has (had?) spectacular tile.
item.content:encoded: You’ve convinced me that I need to make a tiny Art Deco bathroom in miniature…I remember the balcony lobby at the Mayan has (had?) spectacular tile.
